description: The night will be perfect for you to toast with a glass of champagne, but why stop there when you can choose a better drink.The Poinsettia is essentially an easy-to-prepare cranberry&nbsp;mimosa that can blend into your&nbsp;breakfast or dinner table settings without being too flashy! Plus, it has nice bright and citrus flavors, perfect any time of the day.
name: Poinsettia

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the orange liqueur and cranberry juice into a chilled champagne flute.
